title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Fry pancetta until crispy.
Beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan.
Combine spaghetti with pancetta and remove from heat.
Quickly stir in egg mixture and season with pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka masala spice for 1 hour.
Grill chicken until cooked through.
Sauté onion and add canned tomatoes.
Add grilled chicken to the sauce.
Stir in cream and simmer for 10 minutes.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Classic Italian pizza topped with fresh tomatoes, mozzarella, and basil.
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C.
Spread tomato sauce over rolled out dough.
Top with mozzarella and basil leaves.
Drizzle with olive oil.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden.

title: Caesar Salad
summary: Crisp romaine lettuce tossed with Caesar dressing, croutons, and Parmesan cheese.
instructions: Chop romaine lettuce and place in a bowl.
Add croutons and grated Parmesan.
Drizzle Caesar dressing and toss to combine.

title: Beef Burger
summary: Juicy beef patty with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and special sauce in a toasted bun.
instructions: Cook beef patty to desired doneness.
Toast the burger bun.
Assemble burger with lettuce, tomato, cheese, and sauce.
Serve hot.

title: Chocolate Cake
summary: Rich and moist chocolate cake with creamy chocolate frosting.
instructions: Preheat oven to 180°C.
Mix dry ingredients together.
Add eggs, melted butter, and milk and stir to combine.
Pour batter into a greased cake pan.
Bake for 25-30 minutes and let cool before frosting.
